p: Monthly hydrographs of the hydrological components that were created using multiple GCMs and the behavioral parameter sets of the ABCD model were averaged to construct multi-parameter and multi-GCM ensemble streamflow hydrographs for each watershed (Fig. S5; Table 1). It is worth clarifying that the ranges and heights of the boxes represent variations in the projections across the 61 study watersheds in the boxplots.
